webDev.title: Web Developer
webDev.description: I am a $$AGE$$ year old student with a great interest in computer science and driven to further build my skills and knowledge in the world of software development. I am convinced that I can make a valuable contribution to any team or project through my passion for programming and willingness to learn and grow.

pianist.title: Pianist
pianist.description: Music is a significant hobby for me. Both listening and playing have always meant a lot to me. I've been playing the piano for as long as I can remember, but it became more serious after attending music school and learning both the accordion and bass guitar. I'm definitely not a professional, but I enjoy playing for myself and others.
